name: Pro Rugby Manager 2014 (Canceled)
blurb: A sport simulation game where you can become a rugby union team manager and make your way to the top of the rankings!

rewards.reward: KICK OFF PACK                                                                                                     ==============================\r\nIncludes a digital "thank you" postcard from the team + Your name in the credits.

SCORER PACK                                                                                                     ==============================\r\nIncludes a digital "thank you" postcard from the team + Your name in the credits + A digital copy of the game **EARLY BID** Save \u00a310.

WINGER PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes a digital "thank you" postcard from the team + Your name in the credits + A digital copy of the game **EARLY BID** Save \u00a35.

PROP FORWARD PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes a digital "thank you" postcard from the team + Your name in the credits + A digital copy of the game.

TRY PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards\r\n+ An access to the private Beta.

EIGHT MAN PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards\r\n+ One extra digital copy of the game.

HOOKER PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards + You will have your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet.

SCRUM PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards + You will have your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + You will be able to design a in-game jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines).

CONVERSION PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + A limited edition PRM polo shirt

"OVALIE" PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + A limited edition PRM polo shirt + A rugby ball signed by the team.

CHAMPIONSHIP PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nIncludes all the Prop Forward rewards + 1 extra copy of the game + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + 2 tickets for a league match with several countries/competitions available (Transport and hotel not included).

CHAMPIONSHIP WITH FRIENDS PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nAll the Prop Foward rewards + 3 extra copies of the game + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + 4 tickets for a league match with several countries/competitions available (Transport and hotel not included).

DEVELOPER-FRIEND PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nAll the Prop Foward rewards + A limited edition PRM polo shirt + A rugby ball signed by the team + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + 1 day at the studio (transport and hotel not included) + 1 jersey signed by a professional rugby player.

GENEROUS PACK                                                                                                     ============================== \r\nAll the Prop Foward rewards + A limited edition PRM polo shirt + A rugby ball signed by the team + You can design an ingame jersey (in accordance with Cyanide's guidelines) + Your name as a player in-game with your own data sheet + An access to the Private Beta + 1 day at the studio (transport and hotel not included) + A France / New Zealand ticket (November 2013) with 2 developers in the VIP area (transport and hotel not included).
